title: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang Prediction for AI | BIGGEST AI Event of 2025

segments.text: If you're thinking of retiring, this is not the decade to do it. That is a quote by Jensen Huang while giving a speech on AI in Stanford. You might have already seen my recent videos on AI tools, how to use AI, and the number of businesses you can start with AI and know the significance of AI in 2025 and the coming decade. But to be honest, in this era where countless people are confused, you can take your first step towards learning the technology most people are ignoring and make your pot of gold. It was internet in the 1990s, App Store in the 2000s,

SaaS in 2010s and AI agents in 2020s. Only if you know where to look for, you can very easily automate tasks that takes hours or even days to complete and turn them into efficient income streams. Today, a single person can create and scale multi-million dollar businesses all with the help of AI agents. The possibilities of AI is limitless and that is what excites me the most. Hi everyone, I'm Ishant Sharma and if there is one company that is at the center of the AI revolution, it is Nvidia. You might know them for their powerful GPUs.

use, but in 2025 they are more than just a graphics card company. From chat GPT to self-driving cards, Nvidia's AI focused hardware and software have been the backbone of all AI innovations. Every year Nvidia hosts GTC, their annual conference where the latest breakthroughs in AI computing and robotics are showcased. This is where industry leaders, researchers and developers come together to reveal innovations that drive the future of tech. In just the last year's GTC, Nvidia unveiled the next generation GPU architecture

called Blackwell and this has been a game changer ever since. They always come up with advancements in tech that just blow my mind. And in GTC 2025, their expectations are even higher. When Jensen Huang said AI agents are the next trillion dollar opportunity, it made me even more excited for what's to come in this year's GTC. And that's why I knew I had to be there. So I booked my tickets to San Francisco, California, and I'll be attending this event live. Nvidia's GTC 2025 is happening from March 17th till 21st and you can also

the tools and skills you need to succeed in fields like generative AI, conversational AI, edge computing and so much more. With a thousand plus sessions and over 300 plus exhibits, it's all happening from March 17th till 24th. While much of the event happens in person, a hundred plus sessions are free to attend virtually, so that you can participate no matter where you are. Most importantly, you cannot miss the keynote session happening by Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on the 18th of March, 10:30 p.m. IST. This is a must-watch event which sets the tone for

of the industry every single year. But hold up, that's not all. There is also a giveaway that I will be running. You'll be eligible if you are attending the GTC sessions and there is a form link in the description of this video which you can fill to participate in this giveaway. And winners will stand a chance to win Jetson orion Nano kits, five deep learning institute credits to access any online course for completely free, and many more goodies. Trust me, the best thing you can do as a 20-year-old is to stay up to date and know where technology is heading. And this is one of the most important tech events

this off the year. You can check out the link in the description to register for the GDC 2025. It's completely free. And let me know in the comments if you have any questions. Share this video with your friends. Follow for more. Also participate in the giveaway if you want to win those goodies. I'll see you in the next video. And I'll also be sharing updates live from the event next month when I am in San Jose. I'll see you there in GDC virtually or in person. Bye bye.
